name: Warframe Forums Dark Theme Fixes
description: Ever since the forum updates on 9/21/2018 for the official Warframe Forums, they've ... broken the dark theme even more than it was to begin with. I decided to not only fix some obvious broken things with the theme, but also make it much darker to boot.
additional_info: This stylesheet does require you to set your forum theme to the dark one to work properly. If you keep it on light, there will be conflicting colors. I built it to enhance and fix, not completely replace.
